admin.set-bot-channel.desc: Set a channel as the bot-channel.
admin.set-bot-channel.success: {CHANNEL} is now set as the bot channel.
admin.set-bot-channel.no-bot-channel: No channel is set as the bot channel.
admin.set-bot-channel.not-a-text-channel: {CHANNEL} is not a valid text channel.

admin.unset-bot-channel.success: {CHANNEL} is unset as the bot channel.
admin.unset-bot-channel.no-bot-channel: No channel is set as the bot channel.

owner.git-pull.desc: Load the latest source code from git.
